auth.title: Authenticate Ambiclimate
auth.description:
Please follow this [link]({authorization_url}) and **Allow** access to your Ambiclimate account, then come back and press **Submit** below.
(Make sure the specified callback URL is {cb_url})

error.follow_link: Please follow the link and authenticate before pressing Submit

abort.access_token: Unknown error generating an access token.
